random.line: (Hey, traveler. Do you mind scratching my shell? I've got an itch I just can't scratch.)
Cute! I will definitely help you out.
(Hi. Want to see a trick? I can do a barrel roll.
(Hey. Could you do me a big favor and feed me some of that cabbage the farmer threw out? I'm hungry.)
I'd do anything for someone as cute as you!
Aw! You look so cute nibbling on that cabbage!
